event.name: Setting up Game
event.incoming_comms_text: You will have |Wave| wave(s) come at you at 5 min each. They will be coming from the 1 column

event.name: After timer
event.incoming_comms_text: Here they come!

event.name: Setting up Game
event.incoming_comms_text: The Lead ship (First ship in the fleet) will take control of the enemy cargo ships and get them out of this sector. You will need to be within 500k of the ship to beam aboard your away team. Once they have beamed aboard it will take the team 1 minute to take over the ship. After that time your com officer will get them out of this sector through the 5 column. Their will be |Wave| wave(s).

event.name: After timer
event.incoming_comms_text: Here they come!

event.name: Aquiring Cargo ship1
event.incoming_comms_text: We have Beamed aboard. ship will be under our controle within 1 minute

event.name: Aquiring Cargo ship2
event.incoming_comms_text: We have Beamed aboard. ship will be under our controle within 1 minute

event.name: Aquiring Cargo ship5
event.incoming_comms_text: We have Beamed aboard. ship will be under our controle within 1 minute

event.name: Timer for BC1
event.incoming_comms_text: We have taken the ship over but we dont have navagation. Please tell us what course we should take.

event.name: Timer for BC2
event.incoming_comms_text: We have taken the ship over but we dont have navagation. Please tell us what course we should take.

event.name: Timer for BC3
event.incoming_comms_text: We have taken the ship over but we dont have navagation. Please tell us what course we should take.

event.incoming_comms_text: We have taken the ship over but we dont have navagation. Please tell us what course we should take.

event.name: Timer for BC5
event.incoming_comms_text: We have taken the ship over but we dont have navagation. Please tell us what course we should take.

event.name: Timer for BC1
event.incoming_comms_text: We sustained heavy losses and were not able to take the ship. Please send reinforcements.

event.name: Timer for BC2
event.incoming_comms_text: We sustained heavy losses and were not able to take the ship. Please send reinforcements.

event.name: Timer for BC3
event.incoming_comms_text: We sustained heavy losses and were not able to take the ship. Please send reinforcements.

event.name: Timer for BC4
event.incoming_comms_text: We sustained heavy losses and were not able to take the ship. Please send reinforcements.

event.name: Timer for BC5
event.incoming_comms_text: We sustained heavy losses and were not able to take the ship. Please send reinforcements.

event.name: Setting up Game
event.incoming_comms_text: You are attacking the enemy! Destroy their bases!

event.name: Setting up Game
event.incoming_comms_text: Please send your lead ship to dock with us to send engineers aboard.

event.name: After timer
event.incoming_comms_text: Here they come!

event.name: Docking
event.incoming_comms_text: We have received the engineers aboard. This will take us 10 minutes to repair so please keep us safe. If you need more energy please re-dock with us and we will give you what we can.

event.name: Change to ship
event.incoming_comms_text: We are repaired and are heading out at 180. our weapon systems are still offline so please cover us as we exit.

event.name: Setting up Game
event.incoming_comms_text: You will have |Wave| wave(s) come at you at 5 min each. This is all out war so they will come from anywere.

event.name: After timer
event.incoming_comms_text: Here they come!

event.name: Setting up Game
event.incoming_comms_text: You will have |Wave| wave(s) of Carriers come at you at 5 min each. They will be coming from the 1 column. Defend your bases!

event.name: After timer
event.incoming_comms_text: Here they come! Launch the fighters

event.name: Enviroment Setup
event.incoming_comms_text: You have five minutes until Start up. Use this time wisely
